page.title: 12 WHICH WAY IS BEST?
page.content: { The West of Scotland Agricultural {College at Auchincruive}is involved in programmes of research and development which are funded by the{Department of {Agriculture and Fisheries,Scotland.}In these programmes much attention is paid to dealing with the problems and needs of the College Region. The main areas covered are milk, beef and sheep production, treatment and use of farm waste and grass production. However, much of the research which goes into the areas of milk production and the use of grass is done at{the college {dairy farm at Dumfries.}Hill farming methods are carried out at{the two {hill farms, belonging to the College {at Crianlarich. } The research and development work carried out at Auchincruive helps to provide farmers with advice on any problems which they may be facing.
